law.catch_line: A person may not use telephone facilities or equipment to make:...

text.section:
A person may not use telephone facilities or equipment to make:
an anonymous call that is reasonably expected to annoy, abuse, torment, harass, or embarrass another;
repeated calls with the intent to annoy, abuse, torment, harass, or embarrass another; or
a comment, request, suggestion, or proposal that is obscene, lewd, lascivious, filthy, or indecent.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 3 years or a fine not exceeding $500 or both.
